# Read in species lists
```{r}
TRY_species <- read.csv(file.path(data_path,"TropicalAndes_TRY_plant_species.csv"))
BIEN_species <- read.csv(file.path(data_path,"TropicalAndes_BIEN_plant_trait_species.csv"))
```

```{r}
#convert species list into vectors
BIEN_species <- BIEN_species[,2]
TRY_species <- TRY_species[,2]
#what is in both
species <- intersect(TRY_species, BIEN_species)
# what doesn't match
all.equal(TRY_species, BIEN_species)

```
